name: Fire Dance With Me
description:
Pick your favorite Twin Peaks character and Dance Dance with Leland Palmer Player 1: W, A, S, DPlayer 2: Arrow keysIf you are unable to use keys, please click inside the game window

Made for Fantastic Arcade's Duplicade Game Jam

by Robert Gaither (@obj_calavera) & Anja Luzega (@AnjaLuzega)
